mapper.select: SELECT POPUP_ID ,POPUP_NAME ,DATE_FORMAT(START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as START_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as END_DATE ,CONTENT ,USE_YN ,URL ,FILE_ID ,CLOSE_TYPE FROM POPUP_MNG WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY POPUP_ID DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(POPUP_ID) FROM POPUP_MNG WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY POPUP_ID DESC

SELECT POPUP_ID ,POPUP_NAME ,DATE_FORMAT(START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as START_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as END_DATE ,CONTENT ,USE_YN ,URL ,FILE_ID ,CLOSE_TYPE FROM POPUP_MNG WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE ORDER BY POPUP_ID DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT POPUP_ID ,POPUP_NAME ,DATE_FORMAT(START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as START_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as END_DATE ,CONTENT ,USE_YN ,URL , FILE_ID ,(SELECT ORG_FILE_NAME FROM FILE_MNG_SUB WHERE FILE_ID = P.FILE_ID ) AS FILE_NAME ,CLOSE_TYPE FROM POPUP_MNG P WHERE POPUP_ID = #{value}
